eta_values.explanation: η(2) expressed as a gamma quotient: \( \frac{\Gamma(2/3)}{\Gamma(1/3)} \).
η(3) expressed as a gamma quotient: \( \frac{\Gamma(3/4)}{\Gamma(1/4)} \).
η(4) expressed as a gamma quotient: \( \frac{\Gamma(1/2)}{\Gamma(1/3)} \).
η(5) expressed as a gamma quotient: \( \frac{\Gamma(5/6)}{\Gamma(1/6)} \).
